name: Icarus 7DRTS
description:
Icarus

Space-Based RTS. Try to help humanity escape from a dying star.

The aim of the game is to build an interstellar colony ship in order to escape to another star system. Build Mines on moons to gain resources and try to move as many people from the inner planets to the safer outer planets. Created in 7 days for MiniLD44 - 7DRTS.

This is the 7DRTS version of the game, you can try the post-7DRTS version at http://karlin.itch.io/icarus.

Music
  • All This by Kevin MacLeod (http://incompetech.com/)
  • Trio for Piano, Cello, and Clarinet by Kevin MacLeod (http://incompetech.com/)
